"Welcome to Devil's Advocates, a pass-and-play drinking game. After starting a game, the " "application will prompt you to enter all player names. After this is complete, the game " "will start.

"
"The game consists of rounds. Each round, two players will be selected to explain something " "(usually something terrible) regardless of if they disagree with it or don't understand it. "A judge is also selected who holds the phone, reads the topics, and selects the winner. " "The players must then rant in favor of their topic for the specified time without stopping "or repeating themselves. After both players have finished, the judge must decide who wins the round " "based on the strength of the argument and how well the person flowed (i.e. how well he/she " "spoke without pausing or repeating).

"
"Then, the winner of the round will cycle out and the loser will stay for the next round. " "The judge must sentence the loser by drinking. The loser has to drink an equal amount. " "The game ends when everyone gets either too drunk or too bored to keep playing.

"
"This game is recommended for 5+ players. As in, more than five players. But yes, also for " "people over the age of five.

"
"The instructions above assume the default settings.

"
